concept.title: Couchbase Spark Connector 1.0.0 GA (October 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 1.0.0 is the initial general availability (GA) release of the Spark connector and includes the following features:

ul.li: Creation and Persistence of RDDs through KeyValue
Creation of RDDs through N1QL and Views
Native, First-Class DataFrame integration through N1QL
[Experimental] Support for DStream creation through DCP
